positioning: CushLabs.ai is a practical AI engineering studio that turns messy business knowledge and repetitive customer questions into secure, production-grade assistants that reduce support load and improve lead handling—without AI hype or fragile demos. Bilingual customer experiences (EN/ES) with English-first execution for implementation.

brand_voice.rationale: Solo consultant positioning. Use 'I' and 'my' throughout. Never use 'we' or 'our' unless referring to a collaboration with the client.
brand_voice.enforcement: All customer-facing copy must use first-person singular voice.

delivery_model: English-first project execution for speed and clarity. Bilingual (EN/ES) assistant outputs fully supported. Spanish-first clients can be supported via a bilingual partner add-on (PM or solutions consultant).
offers: Clarity Sprint (5–10 days): Convert an ambiguous AI idea into a buildable plan. Deliverables include prioritized use cases, success metrics, knowledge and data audit, v1 scope, architecture outline, and an implementation roadmap.

RAG Assistant Build + Launch (3–6 weeks): Design and deploy a production-grade AI assistant with knowledge ingestion, retrieval tuning, guardrails, analytics, and human handoff flows. Bilingual outputs supported when needed.

Website Lead-Conversion Assistant (2–4 weeks): A sales-focused assistant that addresses common objections, qualifies visitors, captures contact information, and routes prospects to the appropriate CTA. Designed with performance and SEO considerations.

Internal Knowledge Search Copilot (3–6 weeks): A private internal assistant for teams to search policies, SOPs, product documentation, and onboarding materials. Includes role-based access, auditability, and source-referenced outputs.

Optimization and AI Ops Retainer (monthly): Ongoing evaluation, knowledge refresh, retrieval improvements, workflow enhancements, monitoring, and reporting aligned to agreed KPIs such as deflection rate, conversion signals, and response time.
proof: 17 years of Fortune 500 IT leadership experience as an IT Manager, with responsibility for systems, stakeholders, and operational accountability.
5 years of U.S.-based IT consulting, including on-site work with enterprise customers such as Kodak and Corning.
8 years as a profitable solopreneur, demonstrating sustained independent business performance over time.
Premium pricing track record, growing hourly rates from MXN 150 to MXN 500 over eight years.
5-star Google Business Profile rating for a professional coaching business.
Multiple customer testimonials published on owned websites.
Established professional network with 500+ LinkedIn connections and endorsements.
differentiators: Clarity-first methodology: define the decision, use case, success metrics, and scope before selecting tools or building systems.
Production-grade engineering discipline: secure-by-default architecture, validation, logging, testing, and maintainable code.
Outcome-oriented systems rather than one-off demos, with analytics and iteration loops tied to business signals.
Respect for performance and user experience, especially on marketing sites, using light-footprint deployment patterns.
Cross-border readiness for Mexico and LATAM teams serving U.S. and Canadian customers, with bilingual assistant outputs.
Enterprise IT governance mindset combined with solopreneur speed and direct accountability.
Explicit refusal of hype-driven AI, fragile prompt setups, and hallucination-prone knowledge systems.
non_ideal_fit: Teams looking for a cheap chatbot widget with no strategy or governance.
Organizations expecting guaranteed ROI or fully autonomous AI with no human oversight.
Projects that cannot provide any English-speaking point of contact for coordination.
cta: Book a free 20-minute Clarity Call to diagnose your situation and determine next steps. No commitment.
